content: each sleeve to work garter st in the round knit 1 round then 92 100 112 122 132 142 sts at each front and back purl the next check yoke depth note you may place markers of a different colour or type from the raglan markers either side of the work in pattern no further increases continuing garter panels to help keep you on track garter panels until yoke measures at least 3 25 round 1 kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker 3 75 4 25 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 7 25 7 75 8 8 25 kfb k1 sm 4 times 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section 8 75 9 9 5 10 10 5 deep measured from the round 2 knit to garter panel purl garter panel bottom of the ribbing or from the cast-on where knit to marker sm knit to marker sm twice ribbing has not yet been worked at the front of the sweater work rounds 1-2 a total of 7 8 8 9 10 12 13 14 15 15 16 18 20 16 19 21 20 22 22 times this short row shaping optional is 14 16 16 18 20 24 26 28 30 30 32 36 40 32 38 42 40 44 44 rounds optional short row are worked symmetrically 124 140 144 160 172 192 208 216 228 236 around the centre back they lift the back 248 268 284 256 284 308 308 336 348 total sts neckline relative to the front for a slightly better fit but are not required while short-row 26 28 28 32 34 38 42 44 46 46 48 54 58 52 instructions are given for all sizes we prefer to 58 62 60 64 64 sts at each sleeve skip them for kids under 6 so the garment can be 36 42 44 48 52 58 62 64 68 72 76 80 84 76 worn either way 84 92 94 104 110 sts at each front and back we use german short row here however you sizes 0-6 mo to l proceed to check yoke depth can substitute your preferred short-row method sizes xl xxl 3xl 4xl 5xl 6xl only double the stitch on ws with yarn on the ws round 3 kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker slip 1 stitch purlwise pass the yarn over the kfb k1 sm 4 times 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section needle to the rs then back between the needle tips back to the ws this doubled stitch now round 4 kfb knit to garter panel purl garter appears as 2 loops over the needle and you are panel knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 ready to purl sm kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section double the stitch on rs bring the yarn between the needle tips
